Currently the solution implements four features: 1) Reversal avoidance Atlantis can help to prevent rework and process errors in the posting process.  every finance posting in real time and alerts accountants about possible errors that lead to reversals and suggest corrections. 


2) Anomaly detection

The software can help to prevent financial losses. It  detects unusual posting patterns and fraud in real-time. It detects postings with unusual or rare combinations of attribute values for example unusual combinations of general ledger accounts or user accounts, rarely used accounts, unusual booking times  etc. 


3) Accounting field suggestion

Atlantis can help to increase automation and standardization in the posting process of invoices without a purchase order. From the line item text, the supplier number and the amount the softwares AI derives suggestions for the remaining fields like G/L account, LZB number, cost centre, VAT code etc. This suggestions help to significantly reduce manual data input.

4) Avoid duplicate payments
The software helps to reduce duplicate payments. The software analyses paid invoices and alerts the accountant if a duplicate is detect. This allows to recover the financial loss.
